notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.E.B., J.D. and L.A.M. developed the study concept and model framework. S.E.B. and J.D. acquired and cleaned the data. S.E.B. reviewed the literature, performed the model analyses and wrote the first draft of the manuscript. S.E.B., J.D., D.C. and L.A.M. participated in the interpretation of results. All authors participated in the preparation and approval of the final manuscript.
